translated: Verses of the Elders
The Fives
The First Chapter
The Elder Soṇa Kuṭikaṇṇa
I have received the full ordination,
I am liberated, without defilements.
I have seen the Blessed One,

analyzed: vihāre ca saha avasi  bahudeva rattim bhagavā
translated: and we have lived together in the dwelling.🔽For much of the night
the Blessed One lay in the open air.
The Teacher, skilled in dwellings,
then entered the dwelling.
Having spread out his outer robe,
Gotama prepared his bed.
Like a lion in a rocky cave,
he abandoned fear and dread.
Then the one with good speech,
a disciple of the Perfectly Enlightened One,
Soṇa spoke the true Dhamma
in the presence of the best of Buddhas.
Having fully understood the five aggregates,
and having developed the straight path,
having attained the supreme peace,
he will attain final Nibbāna, without defilements.”
… the elder Soṇa Kuṭikaṇṇa …
